PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Motivated Computer Science undergraduate with a passion for crafting scalable software solutions and
solving real-world problems. Skilled in full-stack development with hands-on experience building dynamic
web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and MySQL. Strong foundation in data
structures and algorithms, reinforced by practical project work and continuous problem-solving.  Known
for  quick  learning,  collaborative  spirit,  and  a  drive  to  contribute  meaningfully  to  innovative  software
projects.
EDUCATION
Indian Institute of Information Technology, Sri CityAug 2022 – May 2026
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
CGPA: 7.7 / 10
Relevant Coursework:Data Structures and Algorithms, Operating Systems, OOP, DBMS, Computer
Networks, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Architecture
EXPERIENCE & PROJECTS
ShelfX - Book Rental and Sales Platform(React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, MySQL)
•Developed a full-stack web application enabling users to rent and sell books online.
•Built an admin dashboard to manage users, requests, and inventory in real-time.
•Designed and implemented request workflows (accept/decline) for streamlined user interaction.
Distributed File System(Python, Socket Programming)
•Created a client-server file management system allowing users to upload, read, and delete files.
•Implemented socket communication to handle concurrent requests securely and efficiently.
Hotel Management System(Java, OOP, CLI)
•Designed and implemented a robust hotel management system in Java using object-oriented principles.
•Features include dynamic room management, real-time booking and cancellation, check-in/check-out
date tracking, and room status monitoring (Available, Booked, Under Maintenance).
•Developed an interactive command-line interface for seamless user interaction and efficient hotel op-
erations.
TECHNICAL PROFICIENCIES
Languages:C, Java, Python
Web Development:HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS
